data.title: LeakyCon 2018: Ellie Darcey-Alden
data.meta_description: LeakyCon, the largest fan-led convention celebrating all things "Harry Potter" and "Fantastic Beasts" brought Ellie Darcey-Alden back as a guest! Listen to our interview!
data.text:
She played the role of young Lily Evans in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 and she is just getting started in her acting career. Ellie Darcey-Alden returned to LeakyCon, the largest fan-led convention celebrating all things Harry Potter and Fantastic Beasts from the world of J.K. Rowling, was held last weekend Aug. 10-12 at the Kay Bailey Hutchinson Convention Center in downtown Dallas.

This episode is part of our Geek Gals On-Site podcast series where we travel to events and interview celebrity guests. We had the opportunity to interview Ellie Darcey-Alden, thanks to Mischief Management.

Listen to our interview to learn more about Ellie Darcey-Alden!

Featured images credit: IMDB, Warner Bros. Pictures
